'Pol Verschuere' (Kortrijk, 18 January 1955) was a Belgian professional
road bicycle racer. Verschuere won a stage in the 1980, 1982 and the 1986
Tour de France.
categories: Belgian Tour de France stage winners
Tour de France Champs Elysées stage winners
